title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
created_time: May 15, 2022, 12:12:39 PMLast edit: May 15, 2022, 04:24:55 PM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: Hi all,Welcome to the "Alpen Coin 500'000 Satoshi Silver Plated Bar" Raffle      Ticket price: 0.000565 BTC each, okay to pay after half fullEDIT: 1 spot / persShipping cost free.Payment address: bc1q7dgj2emyav4s7tdhhn3h4r6ne9y48hlk4s68yasend the payment to this address and post here tx id+digit to the raffle in order to buy a ticket.Silver plated bar Serial: D050Loaded with 0.005 BTC or 500,000 SatsDimension: 40x80x6 mmThe bar will come in a box with a COA.  Shipping expected this week.Spots:1.  geo (paid)2.  Suzuki Matt (paid)3.  eclipse33 (paid)4.  Hookzup1 (paid)5.  Bullion-n-BTC (paid)6.  moparmining (paid)7.  Humble Bitcoiners (paid)8.  comit (paid)9. 2stout  (paid)0.  Est2013 (paid)a.  heisty (paid)b.  tldr-hodl (paid)c.  Spokanistan (paid)d.  Dernoste (paid)e.  Cryptogreatdane (paid)f.  JanEmil  (paid)Good Luck and Thanks for participating!
